hi whats the command to check usb stick?: if you've plugged it in, type dmesg. On the bottom it'll show what it is.
Lamego: that gave me a lot of info but i still dont know where my usb is plugged in, could you suggest something... what am I suposed to look for?
unplug, count to 5, plug back in, type dmesg. It'll show something with sda, sdb, or something along those lines.
